event: Strong winds and Large waves along the coast
headline: ORANGE WARNING. Strong winds and Large waves along the coast of Indian Ocean
description:
Strong winds and large waves are expected along the coastal areas. 
Likelihood of occurrence is MODERATE and expected Impacts are HIGH.
The expected impacts of this phenomenon are widespread of rubbish, falling of leaves and small tree branches, challenge to some of marine activities, scarcity of fish and associated impacts.
instruction:
Sea users and Residents of high risk areas are advised TO TAKE ACTIONS

TMA will continue to monitor the situation and issue updates when necessary.
area: Coasts of Mtwara, Lindi, Pwani, Dar es salaam, Tanga,  Unguja and Pemba islands

instruction:

TMA will continue to monitor the situation and issue updates when necessary.
area: Coasts of Kagera, Geita, Mwanza, Mara, Kigoma, Katavi and Rukwa.

event: Strong winds and large waves along the coast
headline: Strong winds Exceeding 40km/hr and large waves exceeding 2.0m expected
description:
Strong winds Exceeding 40km/hr and large waves exceeding 2.0m are expected along the coastal areas. Level of Confidence HIGH (80%). This is due to intensification of a high pressure system along the Tanzania coastline resulting into tight pressure gradient and hence strong southerly flow associated with large waves.

NOTE: 
This is a test message. It should not taken serious.
instruction:
Sea users and Residents of high risk areas are advised to take necessary precautions

TMA will continue to monitor the situation and issue updates when necessary.

NOTE: 
This is a test message. It should not taken serious.
area: Coasts of Mtwara,Lindi, Pwani,Dar es salaam, Tanga,  Unguja and Pemba islands
